notes.title: ☀️ Leo Season Begins
notes.content: Now is the time to express yourself boldly and embrace your inner lion!

notes.title: 🌕 Full Moon in Capricorn
notes.content: Let go of what no longer serves you and set ambitious goals.

notes.title: 💫 Mercury Retrograde
notes.content: Slow down, reflect, and double-check communications and travel plans.
